attributes.action: There should be a Ministry of Silly Walks
attributes.additional_details:
In recognition of the services that the group of comedians, Monty Python have done the country, there should be a Ministry of Silly Walks. Inside, it would be a museum dedicated to all things Monty Python. Of course, Monty Python would have to approve, but we have no doubt that they would agree to having their own museum.
The government should therefore seek the approval of Monty Python then immediately start building a Ministry of Silly Walks. This would generate more tourism as Monty Python is universally regarded as a̶ ̶g̶r̶o̶u̶p̶ ̶o̶f̶ ̶v̶e̶r̶y̶ ̶s̶i̶l̶l̶y̶ ̶p̶e̶o̶p̶l̶e̶ a very influential comedic group.
